description: Comprehensive profiling of a target work's ideas, vocabulary, methodology, metaphors, and framing. Runs 4 engines in sequence: (1) Conceptual Framework Extractor; (2) Concept Semantic Constellation; (3) Inferential Commitment Mapper; (4) Concept Evolution Tracker. Each engine builds on the previous engine's output.
base_description: Comprehensive profiling of a target work's ideas, vocabulary, methodology, metaphors, and framing
